sqlMap.select: SELECT project.ProjectID as ProjectID, project.Name as Name, project.Description as Description, project.CreationDate as CreationDate, project.EstimateDuration as EstimateDuration, project.CompletionDate as CompletionDate, project.CreatorID as CreatorID, project.ManagerID as ManagerID, SUM(time_entry.Duration) as ActualDuration FROM project LEFT JOIN categories ON project.ProjectID = categories.ProjectID LEFT JOIN time_entry ON categories.CategoryID = time_entry.CategoryID WHERE project.ProjectID = #value# AND Disabled = 0 GROUP BY project.ProjectID ORDER BY project.Name
